name: Responsive Whirlpool Threads
description:
Makes viewing threads a bit more responsive, giving more room to the actual post content.
See: https://bitbucket.org/nauzilus/stylish

UPDATE: Whirlpool has been redesigned to be responsive, so this is pretty much redundant. Meh.
additional_info:
Breakpoint 1168px
- moves the user tools (herring/reply to post) to the same side as the user information (username/post count)
- "hides" the left hand menu, hovering near left of screen will bring it back
Breakpoint 600px
- Hides some less important users details (according to me), and puts them at the top of the post.
